title: English 2 l33t Translator
description:
English 2 l33t Translator   
------------------------- 


GENERAL INFORMATION

Type.................: Application
                                        
Platform.............: Windows XP or Vista

How to Install.......: See Installation

Price................: SEED AT LEAST 10 TIMES OF TOTAL SIZE OF TORRENT :D



OVER VIEW AND FEATURES


l33t! "translates" from English to l33tspeak, and let you choose between

different l33tflavors, from "basic l33t" all the way up to "hard l33t".

You can define your own rules or tweak the hardcoded ones by modifying the 

l33trules.xml file (rather self-explanatory).

You'll need the .NET framework to run l33t!



INSTALLATION


Run English 2 l33t Translator.exe

Download Microsoft .NET Framework

(http://download.microsoft.com/download/5/6/7/567758a3-759e-473e-bf8f-52154438565a/dotnetfx.exe)

if needed.
